short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extra shortcut keys for Plex UX SQL Development Environment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is aimed at users of Plex Manufacturing UX SQL Development Environment. It's main goal is to capture the F5 key to avoid losing work due to browser refresh. F5 will execute the query now. 

All shortcuts:
F4 - View stored procedures
F5 - Execute
F6 / ctrl +s - Save stored procedure
ctrl + q - Close SDE tab
Any key - Hide message banner

Known bug: when saving a larger stored procedure a red error banner pops up, but it's immediately replaced by the green 'Stored procedure saved.' banner and the procedure is saved properly.

0.7 - updated to Chrome Web Store Manifest v3
0.6 - changes
 - new switch in the navbar to enable full / basic (catch F5 + hide banner with any key only) functionality
 - ctrl + s now also saves procedure
 - if it's a new procedure, that hasn't a name yet, saving will bring up properties, to avoid accidentally savig with automatic names (only manual save works)
0.5 - fix slowdown
0.4 - hide message banner with any key
0.3 - minor changes to style:
- banner alpha is #dd
- header color is changed 
- SQL keywords are bold
- SQL operators are red
- SQL strings & constants are orange
- red circle around x on the tabs to make it easier to click
